USB_Notification_Header_t Struct Reference

#include <CDC.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t NotificationType
uint8_t Notification
uint16_t wValue
uint16_t wIndex
uint16_t wLength

Detailed Description

Type define for a CDC notification, sent to the host via the CDC notification endpoint to indicate a change in the device state asynchronously.

Field Documentation

uint8_t USB_Notification_Header_t::Notification

Notification value, a NOTIF_* constant

uint8_t USB_Notification_Header_t::NotificationType

Notification type, a mask of REQDIR_*, REQTYPE_* and REQREC_* constants from the library StdRequestType.h header

uint16_t USB_Notification_Header_t::wIndex

Notification wIndex, notification-specific

uint16_t USB_Notification_Header_t::wLength

Notification wLength, notification-specific

uint16_t USB_Notification_Header_t::wValue

Notification wValue, notification-specific
